text: Hybolasius brevicollis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Broun in 1883. It is known from New Zealand.BioLib.cz - Hybolasius brevicollis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1883
title: Hybolasius brevicollis
